00024 #include <cmath>
00025 #include <complex>
00026 
00027 #include "math_util.h"
00028 
00029 namespace em
00030 {
00031 
00032 // Calculate the power from a voltage and a current.
00033 inline nec_float power(nec_complex voltage, nec_complex current)
00034 {
00035         return 0.5* real(voltage * conj(current));
00036 }
00037 
00038 }
00039 
00040 #endif /* __electromag__ */
